articles.description: Welcome to The Hill’s Health Care newsletter {beacon} Health Care Health Care   The Big Story  Trump toes the line on abortion The former president is attempting to appeal to both sides on the issue of abortion by bashing his competitors for backing abortion bans while also claiming credit for the post-Roe era. © Greg…
articles.content:
